name: Hungry Hungry Hungry
description:
Cook for wolf until the wolf is full

. . . or else


Controls: Mouse leftclick

Objective cook the wolf 5 dishes to win.

This is a match three game with a couple twists.

To match click and drag a Gem. connect 2 or more gems.

- Matching 2 gems will Cut

- Matching 3 or more of the SAME will feed a the wolf

- Matching 6 of different type to cook a dish

Important!!! USE ITEMS

Drag and Drop Item on Gems, It will change them

Enjoy!

Feedback is always welcome. hf

The game is Hard good Luck <3
